W08_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_000_TITLE.speaker: UI
W08_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_000_TITLE.text: Cordycep: The World inside a Hole

W08_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W08_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_000_DETAIL.text: After passing through the door, you find yourself in a narrow underground space. Will anything or anyone capture your heart here? And more importantly, how will you get around?

W08_EVAR_SIUG_KENZOKU_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W08_EVAR_SIUG_KENZOKU_000_DETAIL.text: Someone captivating is in this area.
